tool_description: An API dedicated to combing through a select number of sites and compiling in JSON format.
name: Hunting News
title: Hunting News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Picks out the specified media company providing the news article.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hunting-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/foxnews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hunting-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hunting-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hunting-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Hunting News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about hunting.
